title: Crisp breadcrumbed squid with creamy ponzu dressing and Chinese leaf salad
description: Hot crisp breaded squid rings with tangy citrus dressing and salad. This recipe makes a marvellous light meal.
ingredients: 4 medium squid, cleaned and sliced into 5mm/¼ in thick rings
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ red onion, very finely sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
